type: Purchase and Delivery of an Electric Forklift
short_summary: House of Commons requires 1 Electric Forklift to enhance operational efficiency and improve productivity.
description: The House of Commons Warehouse handles the storage and distribution of a range of items. To enhance operational efficiency and improve productivity, the HoC requires an Electric Forklift.
full_summary:
### The Purchase and Delivery of an Electric Forklift
#### Request for Proposal

**Tender Notice**

The House of Commons is issuing a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the Purchase and Delivery of an Electric Forklift.

**RFP Notice Details**

* **Reference Number**: cb-168-69234806
* **Solicitation Number**: 2024039
* **Publication Date**: November 14, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date**: November 29, 2024, 2:00 PM EST
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: December 6, 2024
* **Expected Contract End Date**: December 6, 2024

**RFP Description**

The House of Commons’ Warehouse requires an Electric Forklift to enhance operational efficiency and improve productivity. The successful bidder will be required to provide a suitable Electric Forklift that meets the requirements outlined in the solicitation documents.

**Selection Criteria**

The tender will be awarded based on the lowest price.

**Contract Documents**

The RFP and solicitation documents are available on the MERX website at the following link: [The Purchase And Delivery Of An Electric Forklift - 2024039 | MERX](https://www.merx.com). Prospective bidders are required to register on the MERX website to access the documents.

**Contact Information**

For any inquiries or to request information, please contact Caroline DeRepentigny, Coordinator, Procurement at contractingserv@parl.gc.ca or (613) 996-2352.

### Notice Type: Request for Proposal

### Procurement Category: Goods and Services

### Regions of Opportunity: National Capital Region (NCR)

### Regions of Delivery: National Capital Region (NCR)

The House of Commons reserves the right to cancel or modify the RFP at any time. By participating in this procurement process, bidders acknowledge that they have reviewed and accepted the House of Commons' terms and conditions. The House of Commons is not responsible for any tender notices and/or related documents and attachments not accessed directly through MERX.  comments, suggestions or feedback are welcome to contractingserv@parl.gc.ca with subject as Tender 2024039.
